name: CogVR
description:
Set your mind free


You were kidnapped by aliens and your mind is the only weapon that you can use against them. Solve the puzzle, outsmart your oppressors and save yourself, save the world!

Challenge your mind!


Test your brain sharpness in six different levels. Use your dexterity, concentration, perceptivity and think out of the box to complete'em all!

Real fun - Real tests


All of the tests was prepared based on cognitive and rehabilitative clinical trials in cooperation with Medical Doctors.
Improve yourself!
Raise your skills - compare your scores with the players from the whole world, with your friends and your family. Can you beat them and show the real power of your mind ?
